subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In his debut, Jacob deGrom recorded the first hit of the season by a Mets pitcher, but the Yankees earned a split of the Subway Series as Chase Whitley and the bullpen combined on a three-hit shutout.
snippet: In his debut, Jacob deGrom recorded the first hit of the season by a Mets pitcher, but the Yankees earned a split of the Subway Series as Chase Whitley and the bullpen combined on a three-hit shutout.
